data.name: Healthcare Webinar: "A Smarter Approach to Telemedicine Using Android"
data.summary:
In this webinar, you’ll learn how to:

Streamline over-the-air app & version updates to your Android fleet
Build on key success factors for rapid healthcare device & app updates
Create a point-to-point video chat connections with managed devices in the cloud
Best practices for securely integrating telemedicine into workflows using turnkey solutions like Zoom and Daily.co
Drive rapid video chat upgrades with a guided demo of Esper’s solution
data.speakers:
Yadhu Gopalan
CEO, Esper

Keith Szot
VP Technical Marketing, Esper
